query:
INSERT INTO voting_guide_candidates (voting_guide_id, candidate_id, is_endorsement, note)
                VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4) ON CONFLICT (voting_guide_id, candidate_id)
                DO
                UPDATE
                SET
                    is_endorsement = $3,
                    note = $4
            RETURNING
                candidate_id,
                is_endorsement,
                note
